CustomField.description: The status of a defect will be initially set to Open and will properly be tracked in the external tool to manage the defect, but when the defect is set to Closed here it will be deleted automatically
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The status of a defect will be initially set to Open and will properly be tracked in the external tool to manage the defect, but when the defect is set to Closed here it will be deleted automatically
CustomField.label: Status
